CustomField.description: This field stores the Salesforce ID that is connected to the disclosure (a Salesforce document) that the user is presented with before they agree to the terms. An admin-user specifies the Salesforce ID of the document that is displayed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the Salesforce ID of the document that you want to display for agreement on a particular route in the retail loan workflow.
CustomField.label: Document
